entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
